title: Interpretation of seeing tiles in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about seeing tiles in a dream. They are decorating the floor with different scales to make its wonderful shape and make it more wonderful. There are many of them and they are of different types and they have some colors of tiles and everywhere there must be a floor on these tiles, but what does it mean to see tiles in a dream? Seeing tiles in a dream is positive changes, good luck and good health. Broken tiles indicate a lot of problems, quarrels, and problems. Interpretation of a dream about tiles by Ibn Sirin: Dreaming of seeing tiles in a dream Seeing tiles in a dream, furnished in a place of marble, indicates the arrival of goodness, whether in situations, spouses, or living in real life. For the dreamer. Seeing tiles in necessary places indicates the presence of intimacy and joy. It also indicates earning a living and getting new clothes. Interpretation of a dream about tiles for a man: Dreaming about seeing tiles in a dream If you see a man walking on the floor without tiles in his house, this is an indication of his bad condition. However, if the dreamer sees that he is walking on a road that does not contain paving stones, sand, or cement, this indicates a change in the social or family position of opinion. Seeing a man in a dream taking off his clothes with a court sign means a change in his life. Knowing that the torn tiles are made of cement, this indicates the removal of worries. Dream of seeing tiles in a dream If you see the deposition of luxurious marble tiles, this means that its situation has changed for the better. Seeing paving tiles in white or green is a welcome vision for the dreamer. Seeing tiles in yellow or black is an unpleasant vision for him. Seeing tiles cleaned with water means security and safety, as well as purity and repentance. Interpretation of a dream about tiles for a woman: Dreaming about seeing tiles in a dream Seeing tiles in an unmarried woman’s dream indicates love and a close relationship between her and her relatives and friends. Seeing white tiles is a welcome vision, a symbol of purity and sobriety. Seeing dirty tiles indicates injury, sadness and trouble. Seeing tiles clear indicates the seriousness of trying to change their situation for the better and good news. Dreaming of seeing a tile in a dream Dreaming of seeing a tile in a dream shows a dream of broken tiles in a woman’s dream, and it means wasting money and time. Seeing tiles changing for a married woman indicates a positive change in her life. Seeing new tiles in a pregnant woman’s dream is a sign of her safety and the safety of the fetus. Interpretation of a dream about tiles in a dream: Seeing tiles indicates a safe and stable life. Dreaming about seeing tiles in a dream If you see yourself walking on the floor without tiles, this means hardship and fatigue. Seeing tiles indicates that If a married woman dreams that she is cleaning tiles with soap and water, this is good and indicates a safe and stable life. Seeing tiles in black or yellow can also indicate...

title: Interpretation of a dream about gambling. Seeing gambling in a dream by Al-Nabulsi

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about winning money from gambling Games of chance Gambling in a dream by Ibn Sirin I dreamed that I gambled Interpretation of a dream about playing cards Dice in a dream Broker in a dream Seeing dice in a dream Interpretation of a dream about cards by Ibn Sirin In a dream, it is an invalid affair, and whoever hits a man and plays, hits him awake, and gambling is temptation and temptation. Ibn Shaheen interpreted the dream of gambling and said : The winner and the loser are like chess, and it was said: Gambling is conflict, rivalry, and exhaustion. It is said that a dream about gambling interprets four aspects of the one who plays it: lying, disobedience, blaming people, war, quarreling, and knife wounds. He intends to do something, whether he is traveling or not, and he is thinking. It is a good benefit, so one avoids it, according to the Almighty’s saying: {I was asked about alcohol and gambling. Interpretation of a dream about gambling by Sheikh Waseem Yusuf - YouTube

title: Interpretation of seeing violets in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing violets in a dream: Violet flowers are aromatic plants with beautiful scents, attractive colors, and heart-shaped leaves that usually grow from winter to spring and are loved by many people very much, but seeing them in a dream certainly has many effects and modern meanings today because of the interpretation of sleep to see violets in the dreams of single women. Pregnant and married women and men, as mentioned in dream books and interpretations. Read also: Pumpkin in a dreamInterpretation of seeing violets in a dreamInterpretation of seeing violets in a dreamAs Ibn Sirin says, purple flowers in dreams generally indicate goodness, blessing, and grace, so it is desirable to see them. Watch Purple flowers as gifts in your dreams to receive good news and many happy opportunities for the fortuneteller. Planting violets in a dream means many blessings and abundant food for the fortuneteller and the fulfillment of desires and aspirations. The interpretation of beautiful fragrant purple flowers in dreams is evidence that the dreamer is a good person who will help others a lot. It indicates many From purple flowers in a dream, it indicates that you have received a lot of halal money and that you are ending your sadness and stress. Seeing a bouquet of violets in a dream is a sign of psychological comfort, calm, and stability. Read also: Talking to the dead in a dream. The meaning of violet flowers in Nabulsi’s dream. The dream of a violet picker represents a big problem for To him, which means losing friends. A dream about its fragrant purple flowers is evidence of the pioneer’s good behavior and that he is close to God Almighty. Interpretation of seeing violets for single womenThe meaning of seeing violets in an unmarried woman’s dreams indicates engagement, a close marriage, or a successful business. The dream indicates for a single woman with Violets indicate a formal relationship with a loved one. To see in a dream that you are collecting purple flowers for an unmarried woman is evidence of good news related to her and her happiness in the next life. As for wilted violets in an unmarried woman’s dream, this is a bad sign that she is in a failed emotional relationship that will cause Her sadness. Read also: Seeing 500 riyals in a dream. Seeing violets in a married woman’s dream. The interpretation of dreaming about a purple flower in a married woman’s dream indicates that she lives happily and in peace with her husband and that the quarrel between them has ended. In a dream, seeing a gift from her husband to a married woman with purple flowers indicates the presence of love. And familiarity and mutual understanding between them. Planting and watering violets in a married woman’s dream is evidence of broad self-sufficiency and abundant goodness for her and her family. A married woman who saw violets in a pot in a dream indicates that she will soon become pregnant, especially if she has not yet given birth. Interpretation of dreams about Violets for pregnant women The meaning of buying violets in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates an easy and easy birth without feeling tired or painful. A dream about violets for a pregnant woman means that she will give birth to a beautiful girl and she is very happy with her. Read also: Washing the dead. Seeing violets in a man’s dream. A dream about a man picking violets is evidence of his marriage. Being close to a girl

title: What is the complete interpretation of seeing a bat attack in a dream?

preview.html: Haduta gives you the complete interpretation of seeing a bat attack in a dream. We have collected for you, our dear ones, all the interpretations related to seeing a bat in a dream, complete with the most important books of interpretation and vision. It is natural for a person to see a strange and unrealistic dream in his sleep and it leads to anxiety and psychological discomfort, so there is no need to worry, dear followers, and we will explain to you the complete vision of a bat in a dream for married people, pregnant women, and men. The interpretation of seeing a bat in a dream was completed by Ibn Sirin, said the great scholar Muhammad ibn Sirin. A bat in a dream indicates pure, pious, and virtuous. Also, seeing a bat in a dream indicates good circumstances and repentance from sins, disobedience, and immorality, and God knows best. Also, seeing a man arguing with a bat indicates his close marriage to a good girl who knows God. The bat in the dream complements the imam. Al-SadiqImam Al-Sadiq mentioned that seeing a full bat in a dream means that the sick person is carrying many things on his shoulders. He also explained that seeing a full bat in a dream indicates goodness, safety, and protection of the dreamer from all evil around him. A bat in a dream is considered a desirable dream and a sign that the dreamer will get rid of All annoying things. The bat in Al-Osaimi’s dream. Seeing a bat in a dream full and attacking the dreamer indicates that a malicious enemy is chasing him, so he must be careful and alert to him. Also, seeing someone killing a bat in a dream is a sign that the dreamer will defeat his enemies. Interpretation of a bat attack in a dream Full of a bowling woman. If a girl sees a bat bowl in her dream, this indicates her good condition and also shows her close marriage to the man she loves. Seeing a bat in a dream full of a bowling woman is evidence of the confrontation that she will face to achieve her dreams and ambitions and is a sign of success and distinction. Likewise, seeing a whole bat in The dream indicates purity and repentance to God, and the girl’s obedience to her Lord, and it indicates the girl’s longevity and happy life. If you see a bat in a dream, this may indicate accuracy and entering into a new and good job and earning a lot of living in which you will participate. The interpretation of a bat attack in a dream is full Bowling Woman: If a pregnant woman sees a flying bat in her dream, this means that her date of birth will be specific and that it will be easy, God willing. Also, seeing a bat in a pregnant woman’s dream portends a happy life, a lot of money, and a lot of happy news, and God knows best. Likewise, if a woman sees a The dream is that she is holding a bat in her hands, then this indicates the birth of a healthy child, free of all diseases. The complete interpretation of seeing a bat in a dream for a married woman. If a married woman sees a bat in her dream, this indicates her good work and obedience to her husband and her husband’s family, and God knows best. Also, seeing a bat being killed A married woman in a full dream indicates financial crises that her husband will go through in the coming period. When a married woman sees in her dream that her husband is chasing a bat in a bad way, this indicates sorrows and troubles. Interpretation of seeing a bat in a full dream for a man: If a crooked man sees a bat in his dream, This indicates

title: Interpretation of a dream about diarrhea and its most important indicators

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about diarrhea in a dream: Diarrhea is a problem that many people suffer from, either due to illness, or in the form of a symptom, or due to bad food or allergies to it, and it can lead to frequent diarrhea. For dehydration and other effects on the affected person. This shows us that diarrhea is a very annoying thing in life, as in dreams, doubt enters the mind of the monarch. Interpretation of a dream about diarrhea in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi. Ibn Sirin and Sheikh Al-Nabulsi explained that they saw diarrhea in a dream with negative and positive interpretations. Interpretation of a dream about diarrhea in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi Interpretation of seeing diarrhea in a dream by Ibn Sirin. One of the positive interpretations of Ibn Sirin’s dream of diarrhea during sleep is that it indicates the end of the crises that the dreamer is going through and he can live comfortably. It also indicates an excess of money and a lack of good behavior. However, if he feels the annoying smell of diarrhea during his sleep, this indicates the presence of money in inappropriate ways. Suitable. Also, seeing diarrhea in the eyes of a crowd of people symbolizes the contamination of his name and reputation among the people. On the other hand, the presence of diarrhea on clothes in a dream indicates that he is suffering from an illness. Interpretation of diarrhea in a dream by Sheikh Al-Nabul will explain that he was seeing diarrhea after constipation and it had no smell. In the dream because of the end of the torment and crisis that he was going through. While whoever sees that diarrhea has reached his hands, it symbolizes collecting a lot of money. But if this diarrhea that he sees in his dream is too much, then it warns him that he will lose many things from it. , including his money. Also, if the sleeper sees diarrhea and blood in his dream, this indicates his repeated involvement in mistakes and forbidden things, and it also indicates God’s punishment for forbidden wealth. Interpretation of diarrhea in dreams for divorced women. Diarrhea, as we mentioned above, is an annoying and uncomfortable thing, and seeing it in a dream is annoying. Interpretation of diarrhea. In a dream for a divorced woman. Seeing diarrhea in her dream symbolizes her lack of knowledge on how to manage her money well. Diarrhea in her dream after the pain indicates the end of her worries, while treatment for her in the dream indicates her difficult life. While she watches her ex-husband cleaning the traces of diarrhea, she shows his change and improvement. In his morals. Seeing her walking on yellow diarrhea symbolizes her fall into taboos, and the dirt from a child’s stool symbolizes her sorrows and sad life. Also, if she sees in her dream that she smells foul diarrhea in her house, this warns her of problems and sorrows that will appear in the house. See Also: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a healthy person limping, and its meaning is diarrhea in a dream for a man. Sometimes seeing a man’s diarrhea in a dream appears good and sometimes it is a bad interpretation of diarrhea in a dream for a man. Diarrhea in his dream symbolizes that he will overcome his sorrows and crises without loss. But if he sees that he is eating from his diarrhea, this indicates Depriving him of his source of livelihood. The presence of some worms in the stool indicates that his partner and children have abandoned him. Also, if he sees in his dream that the diarrhea is silver or gold, it warns him until the time comes to give charity on his money. On the other hand, if he sees that the person suffering from diarrhea is...

title: Interpretation of seeing iron in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about seeing iron in a dream via the vision website roy2a.com. Seeing iron in a dream has many meanings. Seeing it can be a good sign or an evil omen. Interpreters differed in the interpretation of seeing iron in a dream, depending on the state and circumstances of the dreamer and whether he was a single man or woman, married or pregnant. Today, through the Vision website, we will discuss the interpretation of seeing iron in a dream. You see iron in a dream in detail based on the opinion of seniors. Interpreters such as Ibn Sirin, Ibn Kathir, Al-Nabulsi, and Imam Al-Sadiq, so follow us. What is the interpretation of seeing iron in a dream according to Ibn Sirin? Seeing iron in a dream indicates that the dreamer is a strong personality with a high degree of intelligence and wisdom. Seeing iron in a dream indicates a lot of what God speaks about people. Seeing iron melting in a dream shows that there is a lot of talk about the fortuneteller behind his back. Seeing that I own an iron in a dream indicates that God will bless the dreamer with abundant sustenance and a lot of goodness and blessings. See also: Interpretation of seeing a cupboard in a dream What is the interpretation of seeing iron in a dream for a single woman Seeing a single iron in a dream shows that she is a girl with a strong personality and has the ability to face all her problems. Seeing molten iron in a dream shows that she is an emotional girl and is affected by any simple thing. Seeing an unmarried woman in a dream holding an iron in her hand shows her ability to stick to things and succeed in them without feeling bored. Seeing a woman alone carving with iron in a dream shows that he will have a lot of money in the near future. Seeing in a dream an unmarried woman putting iron in the fire shows that he will get married soon. Seeing a single woman working in a blacksmith in a dream says that she is doing good deeds in her life. See also: Interpretation of seeing a new interior in a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing iron in a dream for a married woman? Seeing a married woman buying iron in a dream indicates that the coming period of her life will be full of goodness. Seeing a married woman rusting iron in a dream indicates that he will obtain money illegally. Seeing a married woman In a dream, she holds an iron in her hand, indicating that he will soon obtain a lot of lawful money. What is the interpretation of seeing iron in a dream for a pregnant woman? Seeing a pregnant woman with iron in a dream announces that she will give birth to a boy, and God knows best. What is the interpretation of seeing iron in a dream for a man? Seeing a man eating iron in a dream says He is facing great difficulties in his professional life. Seeing a man cutting iron in a dream indicates the end of all his worries and problems in the coming days. Seeing a man fighting an iron person in a dream demonstrates his ability to confront and overcome all his problems. See also: Interpretation of seeing a closed door in a dream. Iron grilles in Dreaming about seeing iron nets in a dream indicates the efforts of the visionary in his life to protect his family and everyone around him and not be afraid to face anything to do so. We are happy to see the reception of your dream of “seeing iron” through the comments and it will

title: Interpretation of dreams by Ibn Sirin, letter ta

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams in terms of seeing letters has many cases in which the scholar Ibn Sirin excelled. Today we look at the interpretation of dreams that appear with the letter T. Interpretation of the General’s Letter by Ibn Sirin. The letter T is one of the letters whose connotations differ between good and evil, or good and bad dreams for a person. It is one of the chapters on letters that Ibn Sirin relied on in interpreting dreams, as the words included these letters. These words came to each of them expressing something in the dreamer’s dream. Interpretation of dreams by Ibn Sirin: The letter Ta for a single woman. The letter Ta is considered one of the well-known letters in the Arabic language and is included. In many linguistic words. It has many connotations if it refers to a person’s dream, which is what Ibn Sirin did and began to interpret. We consider these cases for individuals as follows: An unmarried woman seeing the letter ta’ in her dream, referred to by the word brick, means a lot of sustenance. Which you will get. But it is very difficult to obtain. Seeing Ta in plants starting with the same letter for an unmarried woman is evidence of her recovery from a serious illness from which she suffers. The letter Ta is considered in the dream of an unmarried woman and is represented in the word “obedience,” which has great significance. Closer to God through obedience and avoiding sins and transgressions. The letter T for unmarried women in this situation also indicates the right path that awaits this girl. The letter T in a single woman’s dream indicates her short connection with someone she loves and wants to live with for the rest of her life. Interpretation of the appearance of the letter T in a dream By Ibn Sirin, about a married woman. As we mentioned before, the letters hide behind different connotations and interpretations, and we can mention them: The letter T in the word bird and its meaning when seen in a married woman’s dream, where the bird in a married woman’s dream represents good connections and symbolizes when seen: dream, victory, glory, and success in life. The white bird symbolizes closeness to God Almighty in all deeds. Seeing the bird and its sweet shape indicates the fulfillment of many wishes and hopes. Seeing a bird descending in a dream indicates the stability of the family life of a married woman. Also, seeing an airplane in a dream, and it was a small airplane, It indicates for a married woman that she will begin implementing projects that she aspires to complete in her life. A married woman’s dream and vision of a large plane is evidence of the great livelihood and brilliant success that awaits her. A large plane in a married woman’s dream also indicates the high position she will reach in life. And many... The money will come to her husband from his work in trade. We chose for you: Dictionary of Interpretation of Dreams with Letters. Interpretation of seeing Ta in a dream for a divorced woman and a divorced woman who may see words with the letter Ta, and it was interpreted by Ibn Sirin. From these interpretations we present the following: Seeing a divorced woman in her dream of divorce is evidence of the problems and difficulties that the divorced woman faces after leaving her husband. The dream of divorce in the dream of a divorced woman indicates the anxiety and restlessness that fill her life. Sometimes a dream of divorce for a divorced woman shows that she wants to return to her

title: The name Saud in a dream is for a single, married, pregnant, divorced, or young man

preview.html: The name Saud in a dream for a single, married, pregnant, or divorced man, and for a young man. The name Saud is considered one of the names that promise happiness and pleasure to the one who sees it in his dream, and all its derivatives. The name expresses the same thing in the dream. The name Saud is one of the most used names in the Arabian Gulf and it has a good truth. Therefore, the people of the Gulf are very optimistic about this name, and therefore many people see the name Saud in a dream in the form of a person or a young woman from different positions in this matter and wonder about the name Saud in a dream for single, married, pregnant, divorced and young people. Interpretation of the name Saud in a dream when it concerns Commanding a person in his dream is one of the visions, and the name Saad is one of the promising visions. The correct and special meanings of this name: Among them are those who saw the name Saud in a dream completely, this means that happiness will come to him, and that there are dreams waiting for him in the future. Seeing the name Saud in a dream indicates a prosperous life full of luxury. Gaining survival and fulfilling one’s desire to Traveling or achieving it. He will have happiness in his life and soon you will receive good news. All dreams that follow this logic bring optimism and happiness to those who dream of the dream. The name Saud carries with it many derivatives, and this is considered desirable by people and indicates The happiness that a girl will enjoy when she hears, sees or talks to anyone in a dream bearing the name Saud and seeing the name Saud is for unmarried people. The woman was interpreted according to experts as follows: It appears that this girl will achieve what she desires and will be happy with news of an engagement or a good job. She will marry a rich man, live a happy life and receive good news. If this dream comes in a dream and it is not in the right way, then there are difficulties She will suffer in her life and hope that she will be happy. Interpretation of the name Saud in a dream for a married woman. There are many married women who dream of different things in their sleep, including that the dream has the name Saud or a person named Saud, and this means that they are expecting something important in their lives, such as pregnancy or donating money. According to what experts explained, the interpretation of seeing the name Saud in a dream for a married woman is as follows: Seeing the full name Saud for a married woman indicates that she is living in a stable situation and that there is happy news in her life. In the event that she hears someone calling this name in a dream This means that there is a pregnancy soon. In the case of her husband who came to her and his name is Saud in a dream, this is evidence that the livelihood is great and you will enjoy prosperity with him. She could not write the full name of Saud in the dream because she wishes happiness for her husband. title: Interpretation of seeing a black owl in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a black owl in a dream through the Vision roy2a.com website. Seeing a black owl in a dream has many connotations. Seeing a black owl in a dream can be a sign of good or a harbinger of evil. Interpreters differed in interpreting the vision of a black owl in a dream, depending on the situation and circumstances of the viewer. And if a man or woman is single, married or pregnant, and today through one of the Vision sites, we will discuss in detail the interpretation of seeing a black owl in a dream, based on the opinion of senior interpreters such as Ibn Sirin and Ibn. Many, Nabulsi, and Imam Al-Sadiq, so follow us. What is the interpretation of seeing a black owl in a dream for Ibn Sirin: Seeing a black owl in a dream in general is considered an unpleasant vision, as it indicates death or separation. Seeing a black owl in a dream It shows that he always feels panic, turmoil, and inability to feel comfortable in his life. Seeing a black owl in a dream It can also indicate that he has always lost hope and lives a life full of despair. Seeing an owl in a dream indicates a professional thief who harms everyone around him. Read also: Interpretation of seeing black dogs in a dream What is the interpretation of seeing a black owl in a dream for a single woman: Seeing a single black owl in the house in a dream shows the bad man who does not suit her who will propose to her. Seeing a single black owl in a dream It refers to the people close to her who show her love but feel otherwise. Seeing a black owl in a dream being slaughtered indicates an opportunity that appeared in her life but she could not seize it. Seeing an unmarried woman eating owl meat in a dream indicates a lack of trust between her and the one she loves. Read also: Interpretation of seeing a black snake or a black snake in a dream What is the interpretation of seeing a black owl in a dream for a woman Pregnant: Seeing a pregnant black owl in a dream indicates a woman in her life who hates and detests her. Seeing a pregnant black owl over her house in a dream indicates the bad things that will happen, such as the death of someone close to her, and God knows best. What is the interpretation of seeing a black owl in a dream for a man: Seeing a man as a black owl in a dream indicates that he is a socially isolated person who lacks the ability to achieve his ambitions and desires. Seeing a single black owl in a dream indicates his exit from a love story that ended in disappointment. Read also: Interpretation of seeing a black cow in a dream What is the interpretation of seeing an owl attack in a dream: Seeing an owl attack in a dream It indicates that some are trying to make a conspiracy so that the fortune teller falls into it. Seeing an owl attack in a dream It also indicates the evil ones who hate the divine and seek to harm him. Seeing an owl in a dream swooping on the dreamer shows that there are many problems between him and his family. What is the interpretation of seeing an owl hunting in a dream: Seeing an owl hunting in a dream indicates the dreamer's actions or mistakes towards his family or mistakes related to work. Seeing an owl flying in a dream indicates the dreamer's achievement of his goals and desires And the end of all his worries in his life. Seeing an owl looking at the dreamer with a sharp look in a dream indicates that there is someone in his life who is just planning

title: Interpretation of a dream about catching the head of a snake in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about catching a snake’s head in a dream When searching for an interpretation of a dream about catching a snake’s head in a dream, it is one of the dreams that many wanted to know the interpretation of this dream. It is by diligent scholars who seek to interpret dreams. Interpretation of a dream about catching a snake’s head in a dream Catching a snake’s head in a dream can indicate the dreamer’s ability to achieve success and ambitions. Dreaming about catching a snake’s head in a dream may indicate a material loss that the dreamer will overcome with God’s grace. If Someone saw that he grabbed the head of a snake, this may indicate victory over an enemy who was close to him. And if a person sees the head of a snake and grabs it, this may indicate rejection of the great abuse that surrounded the dreamer at that time, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about a policeman in a dream: Seeing a person being arrested by a policeman indicates some family disputes and problems that he faces during this time. In the event that he is arrested by a policeman, this may indicate some financial crises that the dreamer suffers from during those days. In the event that the person believes That he was arrested by a policeman, this could indicate some obstacles that the dreamer faces in his academic and professional life. It is possible to see a policeman arresting a person in a dream, which indicates some fear that the dreamer felt during this time, and God knows best. Interpretation of dreams For someone who grabs me from my back in a dream. Anyone who sees in a dream that someone grabbed me from behind, can indicate his or her diligence and struggle in life. A dream of someone grabbing me from behind in a dream may indicate the peace and tranquility that the dreamer felt at that time. In a situation If someone sees that someone has grabbed him from his back, this may indicate that he wants to get rid of problems and worries from his life at that time. Seeing someone who has grabbed him from behind can mean that he is free from life’s problems and the beginning of a new page, thanks to God. Interpretation of a dream Carrying the Qur’an in a dreamIf one sees that he is carrying the Qur’an, this may indicate the blessing and nourishment he receives in this period. Seeing someone carrying the Qur’an may indicate positive changes occurring in the dreamer’s life during those days. Seeing yourself holding the Qur’an in a dream may indicate The enormous livelihood that the dreamer will gain during this period. If a person sees himself carrying the Qur’an in a dream, this may indicate positive changes occurring in his life at that time, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about arresting a thief in a dream: Whoever sees in his dream that he has arrested a thief, It may indicate some problems that the dreamer faces in his life on those days. Dreaming of catching a thief in a dream may indicate the arrival of the dreamer’s desires and goals. Anyone who dreams of catching a thief may indicate a material loss that the dreamer will overcome and he must seek God’s help. And in the event that he sees If a person catches a thief, this may indicate that he is cured of illness and freed from pain at that time, thanks to God. Interpretation of a dream about arresting the devil in a dream: It is possible that seeing the devil being captured indicates misfortune that may befall him.
